description.0: Unleashes three swift thunder shadows that deal <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to opponents and leave an Abundance Amulet behind after hitting an opponent.
description.1: 2 Abundance Amulets can be created initially. Using this skill will reset any Abundance Amulets that were generated.
description.4: When a character is near an Abundance Amulet, they will absorb it and obtain the following effects:
5: Increases Energy Recharge during the Abundance Amulet's duration.
description.7: You and Paimon discuss the paths by which electricity might flow.

description.0: You call upon the protection of lightning, knocking nearby opponents back and dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to them.
description.3: When your active character's Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, they will call Falling Thunder forth, dealing <electro>Electro DMG.</electro>
description.4: When Falling Thunder hits opponents, it will regenerate Energy for that character.
description.5: One instance of Falling Thunder can be generated every 0.5s.
description.7: You and Paimon studied the light that flashes through the clouds.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: When another nearby character in the party obtains an Abundance Amulet created by Lightning Blade, Lightning Blade's CD is decreased by 1.5s.
Increases the Energy Recharge effect granted by Lightning Blade's Abundance Amulet by 10% of the Traveler's Energy Recharge.
The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using Lightning Blade is increased to 3.
When Falling Thunder created by Bellowing Thunder hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.
Increases the Level of Bellowing Thunder by 3.
When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by Lightning Blade, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.
Increases the Level of Lightning Blade by 3.

Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, which will deal 200% of its original DMG and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.

name: Traveler
description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo> to opponents in front of you.
description.1: The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
description.4: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
description.7: If the vortex comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>/<cryo>Cryo</cryo>/<electro>Electro</electro>, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
description.8: Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
description.10: You discussed the way to grasp the formless wind with Paimon.

description.0: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.3: If the tornado comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>/<cryo>Cryo</cryo>/<electro>Electro</electro>, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
description.4: Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
description.6: You and Paimon studied the flapping of a butterfly's wings.

description.0: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo> to all opponents in its path.
Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.
Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.
Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3.
Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.
Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3.
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
description.1: If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
description.1: The meteorite is considered a <geo>Geo Construct</geo>, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.
description.4: This skill's positioning may be adjusted.
description.6: You spoke with Paimon about the final destination of falling stars.

description.0: Energizing the Geo deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves.
description.1: Launches surrounding opponents back and deals <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
description.2: A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave.
description.3: The stone wall is considered a <geo>Geo Construct</geo>, and may be used to block attacks.
description.5: You and Paimon studied the pulse of the mountains.

description.0: Reduces Starfell Sword's CD by 2s.
The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.
When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.
Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3.
The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
description.1: A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

description.0: Increases the Level of Starfell Sword by 3.
The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer.
description.1: The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: With a flourish of your blade, you unleash a spray of razor-sharp leaves that go before you and deal <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro>.
description.2: You and Paimon observed the flowing edges of grass and leaf.

description.0: Calling upon the might of the flora all around you, you create a Lea Lotus Lamp. This Lamp will deal continuous <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> to opponents within its AoE.
description.3: The Lea Lotus Lamp will undergo the following changes after it comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<electro>Electro</electro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>:
4: <hydro>Hydro</hydro>: the Lamp's AoE and the AoE of its attacks are increased.
<electro>Electro</electro>: the Lamp's ATK SPD is increased.
<pyro>Pyro</pyro>: the Lamp will explode after a short delay and then disappear, dealing <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro>.
description.5: The Lea Lotus Lamp can only undergo one Lotuslight Transfiguration in its duration.
description.7: Only one Lamp created by the Traveler can exist at any one time.
description.9: You and Paimon studied the sounds of plants that sprout after the rain.

description.0: Lea Lotus Lamp will obtain one level of Overflowing Lotuslight every second it is on the field, increasing the Elemental Mastery of active character(s) within its AoE by 6. Overflowing Lotuslight has a maximum of 10 stacks.
Every point of Elemental Mastery the Traveler possesses increases the DMG dealt by Razorgrass Blade by 0.15% and the DMG dealt by Surgent Manifestation by 0.1%.
After Razorgrass Blade hits an opponent, it will regenerate 3.5 Energy for the Traveler.
Lea Lotus Lamp's duration is increased by 3s.
Increases the Level of Razorgrass Blade by 3.
After the Lea Lotus Lamp triggers a Lotuslight Transfiguration, it will obtain 5 stacks of the Overflowing Lotuslight effect from the Passive Talent "Verdant Overgrowth."
description.1: You must have unlocked this Passive Talent first.

description.0: Increases the Level of Surgent Manifestation by 3.

The Dendro DMG Bonus of the character under the effect of Overflowing Lotuslight as created by the Lea Lotus Lamp is increased by 12%. If the Lamp has experienced a Lotuslight Transfiguration previously, the character will also gain 12% DMG Bonus for the corresponding element.
